name: R-CMD-check

on:
  push:
    branches: [ master ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ master ]

jobs:
  R-CMD-check:
    runs-on: windows-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Set up R
        uses: r-lib/actions/setup-r@v1
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          install.packages('devtools')
          devtools::install_deps(dependencies = TRUE)
      - name: Check
        run: |
          R CMD build .
          R CMD check *.tar.gz
